mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOM_CARD ( custom_no, member_no, image_blob, status, reason, custom_service, created_at, ai_result, ai_reason ) VALUES ( #{customNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{memberNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{imageBlob,jdbcType=BLOB}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{aiResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT custom_no AS customNo, member_no AS memberNo, image_blob AS imageBlob, status AS status, reason AS reason, custom_service AS customService, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, approved_at AS approvedAt, ai_result AS aiResult, ai_reason AS aiReason FROM CUSTOM_CARD WHERE custom_no = #{customNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE CUSTOM_CARD SET AI_RESULT = #{aiResult}, AI_REASON = #{aiReason}, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE CUSTOM_NO = #{customNo}
